autoflatten.name: Automatically Flatten NPCs
autoflatten.hint: If enabled, any new NPCs dragged in from the compendiums will automatically be flattened.

multiplier.name: Reduced proficiency modes
multiplier.hint: Select how much of the level will be used with proficiency. Unflatten and flatten all actors to apply the update.

roundingMode.name: Rounding mode for calculation
roundingMode.hint: Select rounding mode for calculation of flattening value. Unflatten and flatten all actors to apply the update.
